subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Niclas Bergfors scored twice, and Clarke MacArthur and Evgeny Artyukhin scored in their Atlanta debuts Thursday night to help the Thrashers beat the visiting Islanders, 6-3.
snippet: Niclas Bergfors scored twice, and Clarke MacArthur and Evgeny Artyukhin scored in their Atlanta debuts Thursday night to help the Thrashers beat the visiting Islanders, 6-3.
